com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.steps
Class StepStatus

java.lang.Object
  com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.steps.StepStatus

public class StepStatus
extends java.lang.Object

Scripting class to determine if a step should execute based on the statuses of prior steps. This is exposed as 'stepStatus' in Step Pre-Condition scripts.

As a note, every script must return either true or false.

Examples:

To always run a step: 

    true
To never run a step: 
    false
To check if the prior step had a status of success: 
    stepStatus.priorIn(SUCCESS)
To check if the prior step was success, success with a warning, or not needed: 
    stepStatus.priorIn(SUCCESS, SUCCESS_WARN, NOT_NEEDED)
To check if all prior steps had a status of success: 
    stepStatus.allPriorIn(SUCCESS)
To check if all prior steps were success, success with a warning, or not needed: 
    stepStatus.allPriorIn(SUCCESS, SUCCESS_WARN, NOT_NEEDED)
To check if any prior step had a status of success: 
    stepStatus.anyPriorIn(SUCCESS)
To check if any prior step was success, success with a warning, or not needed: 
    stepStatus.anyPriorIn(SUCCESS, SUCCESS_WARN, NOT_NEEDED)

Method Detail

allPriorIn

public boolean allPriorIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check to see if all prior step statuses match a list of supplied statuses.

Parameters:
statuses - A comma-separated list of statuses that the prior steps must match. If there is only one status, then all step statuses must match that status. If there is more than one status, the steps may have any of the statuses in the list.
Returns:
True if all steps have statuses that match any of the statuses in the list. False otherwise.

anyPriorIn

public boolean anyPriorIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check to see if any of the prior step statuses match a list of supplied statuses.

Parameters:
statuses - A comma-separated list of statuses that the prior steps may match. If there is only one status, then a step status must match that status. If there is more than one status, the steps may have any of the statuses in the list.
Returns:
True if any step has a status that matches any of the statuses in the list. False otherwise.

priorIn

public boolean priorIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check to see if the prior step status matches a list of supplied statuses.

Parameters:
statuses - A comma-separated list of statuses that the prior step must match. If there is only one status, then the step status must match that status. If there is more than one status, the step may have any of the statuses in the list.
Returns:
True if the prior step has a status that matches any of the statuses in the list. False otherwise.
